title: Enhancing groundwater quality assessment in coastal area: A hybrid modeling approach
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Md Galal Uddin, M.M. Shah Porun Rana, Mir Talas Mahammad Diganta, Apoorva Bamal, Abdul Majed Sajib, Mohamed Abioui, Molla Rahman Shaibur, S.M. Ashekuzzaman, Mohammad Reza Nikoo, Azizur Rahman, Md Moniruzzaman, Agnieszka I. Olbert
